name: Super Chess Card Wars
description:
Burly chess pieces duel to become champion of the card game War! Do you have what it takes?!

Made within 48 hours between 4/20/18 and 4/22/18 for Ludum Dare 41 and GM(48) 26.

WARNING: If you're here for Ludum Dare, please know that the html version has been refined and has computer opponents added in. As much as I'd love for you to check those out because I'm pretty pleased with my solution, they are not part of my Ludum Dare entry. Please see below for my windows exe and my project files for the Ludum Dare. Hope you enjoy!
